mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date,stock ) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.NEXTVAL , #{prodName} , #{prodDetail:VARCHAR} , #{manuDate:VARCHAR} , #{price:NUMERIC} , #{fileName}, SYSDATE,#{stock} )
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date, stock FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name,p.image_file, p.price, p.reg_date, p.manufacture_day, t.tran_status_code,p.prod_detail,p.stock FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no= t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.price like '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, p.reg_date, p.manufacture_day, t.tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no= t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.price like '%${searchKeyword}%'
) countTable
